description: Dicey Dungeons is a roguelike deck-building game where players navigate through dungeons using dice rolls to defeat enemies.

v0.0.1-alpha.description:
First release. 

What should hopefully be possible:

- Inclusion in multiworld generation by putting .apworld file in custom_worlds
- Dicey Dungeons mod generation, will appear in the output as a zip file, which should be unzipped, then "diceyap" directory loaded into Dicey Dungeons /mods location
- Launch of Dicey Dungeons client from the Archipelago Launcher. Boot game by running /dicey here after connecting.
- Collection of items in game (mostly) and sending to server.
- Sending game completion to server once all 6 Warrior episodes have been completed.

Known issues:

- File that is output for the mod is a .zip (probably frowned upon in AP) which must manually be installed by user. Future state will be something like a .apdicey file which can be patched in through the client
- There are LOTS of debug messages still in the Client, that I am using for testing, and will eventually remove.
- Episode 2 is hacked for boss / episode completion testing. Collecting all items here will not be possible
- All starting equipment has been replaced with a testing equipment, which instantly kills everything. This will be removed, eventually.
- Game must be in default Steam installation path, for now. Future state is the Client should handle setting this.
- Most game options are non functional, or misleading. These will need cleaned up.
- Icon for the Client in the launcher is broken, even though it worked when running from source. Sad.
v0.0.1-alpha.title: v0.0.1-alpha

v0.0.2-alpha.description:
- Fixed warrior icon appearing in Launcher
- Cleaned out a lot of _slop_ which was sticking around from when the Client was going to have a socket connecting to the game, rather than just run the game out of the Client
- Turned DEBUG off for shipped .apworld
v0.0.2-alpha.title: v0.0.2-alpha

v0.0.3-alpha.description:
- Cleanup more slop
- Configurable install location in Client
- Required item counts for each floor (to hopefully make it playable every time and not just give out dice shards and nothing else)
- Episode completion locations actually send on episode completion (reformat episodes.csv)
v0.0.3-alpha.title: v0.0.3-alpha

v0.0.4-alpha.description:
- Stop crash on episode completion
- Items added once per episode (rather than once across all episodes) making it somewhat playable
- Mod can be installed via /patch command in Client, rather than manual installation with output file (file is still output for now though)
v0.0.4-alpha.title: v0.0.4-alpha

v0.1.0-beta.description:
Beta release of the Dicey Dungeons Archipelago mod.

Documentation for playing can be found in the /docs directory for this world, but brief notes here.

Generation:
1. Install the .apworld file into your Archipelago's custom_worlds
2. Set up your .yaml player options either through the Launcher's "Options Creator" or by modifying the attached .yaml
3. Generate the game using the Launcher's "Generate"

Playing:
1. Launch the "Dicey Dungeons Client" from the Archipelago Launcher
2. Connect to your multiworld's host:port and your slot name
3. Set your install path using `/install_location [your installation location]` (Not necessary if in default Steam install path)
4. Run the command `/patch` to patch your game to handle the custom logic and items
5. Launch Dicey Dungeons **from the client** with command `/dicey` (The mod can only see your location checks and set up your items correctly if you launch from the client)
6. Enjoy

Notes:
- Due to technical issues I haven't figured out (yet), AP items from Dicey Dungeons send when you start any combat with them equipped. They will not send from your backpack, they have to be equipped. This is top on my list of things I would fix if I knew how
v0.1.0-beta.title: v0.1.0-beta

v0.1.1-beta.description:
Changelog from v0.1.0-beta

- AP checks now send from your equipped items AND what's in your backpack! Meaning you don't have to make sure it's equipped, and sacrifice an equipment slot, to get those items out. Note: Item will hang out in backpack forever, which shouldn't affect AP / client.
v0.1.1-beta.title: v0.1.1-beta

v0.1.2-beta.description:
- Commas in AP multiworld items should no longer crash the game on startup

Multiworlds generated with Dicey Dungeons v0.1.0 and after should be fully playable with this release
v0.1.2-beta.title: v0.1.2-beta

v0.1.2.1-beta.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Fylcoast/AP_diceydungeons/compare/v0.1.2-beta...v0.1.2.1-beta

- AP items with hyphens in their names should no longer cause Dicey Dungeons to freeze on episode start.

Adding new minor version increment because it's just another character fix
v0.1.2.1-beta.title: v0.1.2.1-beta
